channel.title: CVE Feed for RISCV.org -- Machine Trap Base Address (MTVEC) Register
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RISCV.org -- Machine Trap Base Address (MTVEC) Register

item.title: CVE-2021-1104|2024-08-03T15:55:18.614Z -- riscv.org -- machine%20trap%20base%20address%20%28mtvec%29%20register
item.description: The RISC-V Instruction Set Manual contains a documented ambiguity for the Machine Trap Vector Base Address (MTVEC) register that may lead to a vulnerability due to the initial state of the register not being defined, potentially leading to information disclosure, data tampering and denial of service.
